sentence.Network_en: And he gave them their request; but sent leanness into their soul.
sentence.Network_cn: 15他将他们所求的赐给他们, 却使他们的心灵软弱.

sentence.Network_en: But I said, My leanness, my leanness, woe unto me!
sentence.Network_cn: 我却说, 我消灭了, 我消灭了, 我有祸了.

sentence.Network_en: He increased the leanness and suppleness of the organization.
sentence.Network_cn: 他增加了组织的依赖性和可塑性.
